title: Site Search (Redirect)
content:
[[module Redirect destination="search:crom"]]

[!--
Go directly to the Crom search page on clicking the "search" button.

Previously this page used a third-party cookie workaround to preserve the search query. However some search engines wrongly believes that the site was compromised / infected with malware, so the workaround was removed. See http://crom.wikidot.com/wiki-search for more information.
--]
author: aismallard
